title: Custom I.T. Solutions in Belleview, FL
headline: Need something more advanced? Let's build a secure, personalized tech plan that fits you.
description: Advanced cybersecurity and custom technology consulting in Belleview. Get help with privacy planning, network design, smart home lockdowns, and more. Tailored to your needs.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
sections.paragraph: Off-the-shelf solutions often leave gaps in security, performance, or privacy. Whether you're running a home lab, hosting sensitive data, or building a smart home, you need more than generic advice.

sections.heading: What We Do
items: Lock down smart home ecosystems (Apple, Google, Alexa)
Consult on encrypted file sharing, cloud, and self-hosting
Implement privacy tools like VPNs, DNS over TLS, or TOR
Help you build or repurpose hardware for secure use cases

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: We start with a technical consultation to understand your goals, constraints, and security needs. From there, we build a tailored plan: hardware, software, and configuration guidance. Full support available every step of the way.
